"Steerable Chaos" is the new model of influence upon enemy developed by the White House strategists using now in fight against Сhina! And now Washington is playing intently the national-religious card in Xinjiang Uighur autonomous region of China by kindling of Uighur separatism by Islam radical! As well-known this region of China settled by Muslims minority groups which trying to get independent during some centuries! By this way we can view any China's counteraction of extremism as a fight against USA for independent and territorial integrity! For US' part Washington and its media machine could set up a howl of infringement of minority groups' rights and then independence of autonomous region!
